means: （使）缩短，减小，减少( decrease的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The number of independent firms decreased from 198 to 96.
sentence.Network_cn: 独立公司的数量从198个减少到了96个。

sentence.Network_en: The number of young people obtaining qualifications has remained static or decreased.
sentence.Network_cn: 获得资格证的年轻人数量一直维持不变或出现下降。

sentence.Network_en: Raw-steel production by the nation's mills decreased 2.1% last week.
sentence.Network_cn: 上周该国钢铁厂的原钢产量下降了2.1%。

PerfectNetExp.abs: (1) The heat elimination loss of improved design has apparently decreased.（1） 改进后的锅炉散热损失有了明显降低。
result : CDCA significantly decreased the content of NO of serum and trachea tissue in mice结果:CDCA能极显著地降低大鼠血清和气管组织中的NO含量的影响。
the content of Cr ( III plating bath is decreased constantly by using Pb-Sn anode containing ca . 20 % Sn .实践发现，采用含锡量为20%左右的铅锡阳极时，三价铬含量有不断下降的趋势。
during two weeks that anthocyanin begined to accumulate , flavonoid and total phenol decreased .在花青苷开始积累的两周内类黄酮和总酚含量下降。

list.abs: 数学名词的英文翻译_百度知道 ... decreased 减少 decrease to 减少到 decrease by 减少了.
decrease 递减decreasing function 递减函数；下降函数decreasing sequence 递减序列；下降序列
反应低下(decreased responsiveness)是一组临床症状包含一定程度的意识... [详细] 厌奶 　　厌奶是儿童厌奶期的一种现象。
decreasing function 递减函数；下降函数decreasing sequence 递减序列；下降序列decreasing series 递减级数；下降级数

entry.def: When something decreases or when you decrease it, it becomes less in quantity, size, or intensity.

example.ex: Population growth is decreasing by 1.4% each year...
example.tran: 人口增长率正在以每年 1.4% 的速度下降。

example.ex: The number of independent firms decreased from 198 to 96...
example.tran: 独立公司的数量从 198 个减少到了 96个。

entry.def: A decrease in the quantity, size, or intensity of something is a reduction in it.

example.ex: ...a decrease in the number of young people out of work...
Bank base rates have fallen from 10 per cent to 6 per cent — a decrease of 40 per cent.
example.tran: 银行的基本利率已从 10% 降到了 6%，降幅高达 40%。

means.word_mean: 1. made less in size or amount or degree

auth_sentence.content: The accident which I suffered...has greatly decreased my mobility.
auth_sentence.res_content: The accident which I suffered...has greatly decreased my mobility.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The accident which I suffered...has greatly decreased my mobility.

auth_sentence.content: The bruise was still visible...though the swelling had decreased.
auth_sentence.res_content: The bruise was still visible...though the swelling had decreased.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The bruise was still visible...though the swelling had decreased.

auth_sentence.content: Better treatment is largely responsible for decreased infection rates.
auth_sentence.res_content: Better treatment is largely responsible for decreased infection rates.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Better treatment is largely responsible for decreased infection rates.

Sentence.sentence: E-book sales are up 146 percent over last year, while hardback sales increased 6 percent and paperbacks decreased 8 percent.
